title: encoding/gob: performance regression on tip vs 1.0.3 on amd64
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. git clone https://github.com/davecheney/autobench
2. cd autobench
3. make bench

# autobench is a small harness for running the Go 1.1 go1 tests against go 1.0.3 and tip.

What is the expected output? What do you see instead?

On linux/amd64 several people have reported GobEncode wall time has increased
significantly 

BenchmarkGobEncode                 11127380     14413551  +29.53%

Please use labels and text to provide additional information.
